item.title: Ethan Goldman’s Anchor Entertainment Signs With Verve (Exclusive)
item.description: The production company behind ‘Rather’ and ‘Rebel Hearts’ is ramping up in the documentary and docuseries spaces.

item.title: Moby’s Film and TV Banner Signs With Verve (Exclusive)
item.description: The artist and activist’s production banner Little Walnut makes scripted TV and movies, unscripted content, including documentaries, music videos, animation and graphic novels.

item.title: Moby’s Film and TV Banner Signs With Verve (Exclusive)
item.description: The artist and activist’s production banner Little Walnut makes scripted TV and movies, unscripted content, including documentaries, music videos, animation and graphic novels.

item.title: Three Six Zero Names Aimee Jessiman U.K. Head of Management
item.description: She has been working with the likes of Calvin Harris and Swedish House Mafia.

item.title: Henry Samuel, Son of Heidi Klum and Seal, Signs With Next Management
item.description: The supermodel and “Kiss From a Rose” singer’s eldest son is looking to expand his own profile in fashion and entertainment.

item.title: Creator Maris Jones Signs With CAA (Exclusive)
item.description: The digital artist and director is known for camp “mini-movies” inspired by pop culture and a retro-fantasy aesthetic that caught the attention of major brands like Apple, YouTube and Netflix.

item.title: Creator Maris Jones Signs With CAA (Exclusive)

item.title: Creator Eric Sedeno Signs With UTA (Exclusive)
item.description: The influencer has parlayed comic TikTok and Instagram videos into a solid online following, brand collaborations and a platform to discuss LGBTQ+ issues.
